title: @riot It's not too late.
body:
You can still revert the sej rework before you need to nerf her, and maybe send out a message saying "We at riot games did a fuck-up and reworked a character that didn't really need it in a way that would break the shit out of them"

Also if you end up reverting things take a look at skar and malz, and maybe morde. they would all like that I think.

replies.body: they could just hotfix it out, and I think they still have the files for old sej in their computers so it wouldnt be too bad.
Why would they revert it? They can simple trim off power wherever

The problem is less that her kit is overpowered, and more that it isn't alike to old sejuani in any regard. and when it comes to trimming power, keep in mind that her current kit is very akin to malzahars, which is indicitive of her recieving a great many nerfs, which of coures her current form needs, its absurdly strong, but it will make her much worse than what she was.
She doesn't need to be reverted. They made her better than she was.

no, they gave her a kit that was absurd. having an absurd kit and being better are not the same thing. look at malz. his kit is absurd, and after his rework he saw a ridiculous maount of success, but look at him now, he can't even be played as a midlaner anymore.
This is the path that sej is going to take.

Lel. You just don't like it, that doesn't mean it's not better.  Many of us like it and find it much better than her old kit.

Malz his problems in general. His whole existence should be wiped and started over.  Reverting him wouldn't even help.
you see the problem is people are finding it better because its busted af. after it recieves its nerfs people won't like it anymore and it will essentially be dropped into obscurity.

lel. just cause people think it's op doesn't make it.  I've fought her and beat her quite a few times. There's still clear weaknesses in her kit.  The update though better suits her as a character, the design is much better.
I still dislike it heavily, and as someone that rather enjoyed old sej I am mad at her change.
